H0.text: A warm sunny period in Autumn (Fall) in the northern hemisphere is called an. Second Spring

H1.text: A warm sunny period in Autumn (Fall) in the northern hemisphere is called an. Autumn Glow

H2.text: A warm sunny period in Autumn (Fall) in the northern hemisphere is called an. False Summer

H3.text: A warm sunny period in Autumn (Fall) in the northern hemisphere is called an. Indian Summer

A4.text: An Indian summer is a period of unseasonably sunny, warm weather in autumn.
